content: all of my socials can be found here 1 if you don t post i d still love to see your creation--you can message on insta or fb messenger you can sell what you make with the pattern you may not redistribute my pattern in any way if you want to share my pattern please use the ravelry/blog url info ch1 does not count as a stitch you ll need l hook 8mm charisma yarn/weight 5 bulky yarn needle scissors 1 https //linktr ee/cascadefiberworks
